title: CyberLink YouCam Deluxe 6.0.2728 Retail + Holiday Pack 5 for Cyb
description:
================
 [INFO:]
================


CyberLink YouCam Deluxe 6.0.2728 Retail + Holiday Pack 5 for CyberLink YouCam Deluxe 6 | 570 MB


Cyberlink YouCam - an excellent program for creating your own funny avatar, video images, clips using web-camera. YouCam is indispensable for online video chats and includes support for popular solutions Yahoo! program allows you to add dynamic effects to your network cameras. Support new OS Windows 8.1.

Apply effects immediately during capture video and photos. Upload your clips directly to YouTube. Immediately send your photos and videos to friends via e-mail. Dual Mode user interface makes it easy to use program CyberLink YouCam. While instant messaging can participate in multi-user Video with friends using webcams, applying instant effects in real time. Instant effects let you add frames, filters, distortions, and emotional effects to the video from a webcam. This allows you to add videos funny and creative visuals.

The program offers five types of video effects:
Animated three-dimensional effects - very funny effects
Emotions - have a creative influence at all. More than 20 objects
Frames - these effects add a theme to photos or videos
Distortion - modeled effects, the effect of distorting mirrors
Drawing tools - makes video chats more expressive, creating designs
Filters - effects both on television

New features in version 6:

Record HD video in H.264 format
Use HD effects
Record desktop in HD
Record HD Video & Snapshot
Face Login to Windows - remembers the person to enter under your username in Windows
Face Login to websites - remembers the person to enter under your username on various websites
Face-out (Deluxe) - detects when you leave your computer, and blocks it.
Create a video presentation
Support video input from two sources
Creating avatars
Particle effect with the definition of the image
 

Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : Multilanguage
